summary:

title: Embracing the Unexpected

summary:
Today's FiftyIn50 question asks:
How do you like to watch movies.  Are you a theatre goer, a streamer, or do you like physical media. 
There was a time, way back when, I use to go to the cinema at least twice a week...
title: Movie Madness
